member.name: T:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.CorsHelpers.AccessTokenInQueryStringHandler
member.summary: A handler reads 'token' query string and adds the Authorization header based on its value. It is used to support Internet Explorer 9 XDR object (used to perform CORS request). For more information, see the wiki page: https://wiki.iqmetrix.com/display/Platform/Internet+Explorer+CORS+(Cross-origin+resource+sharing)+Support

member.name: T:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.CorsHelpers.AsyncCallableHandler
member.summary: It wraps a DelegatingHandler to expose protected SendAsynch member See why here: http://wizardsofsmart.net/post/how-to-use-base-sendasync-in-f-delegatinghandler/

member.name: T:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.CorsHelpers.OverrideHttpMethodHandler
member.summary: A handler that updateds the request's HTTP verb from POST to method requested in 'method' query parameter (POST, PUT or DELETE). It is used to support Internet Explorer 9 XDR object (used to perform CORS request). For more information, see the wiki page: https://wiki.iqmetrix.com/display/Platform/Internet+Explorer+CORS+(Cross-origin+resource+sharing)+Support

member.name: T:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.CorsHelpers.SuppressResponseStatusCodeHandler
member.summary: A handler that wraps response's content in an JSON object that additionally contains HttpStatusCode It is used to support Internet Explorer 9 XDR object (used to perform CORS request). For more information, see the wiki page: https://wiki.iqmetrix.com/display/Platform/Internet+Explorer+CORS+(Cross-origin+resource+sharing)+Support

member.name: T:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.CorsHelpers.XDRCorsHelper.SuppressedResponseStatusCodeModel
member.summary: This is a wrapper that contains response's status code and content type in addition the body.

member.name: M:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.CorsHelpers.XDRCorsHelper.SuppressResponseStatusCodeAsyncTask(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue},System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage)
member.summary: Wraps responses content in an JSON object that additionally contains HttpStatusCode

member.name: M:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.CorsHelpers.XDRCorsHelper.SuppressResponseStatusCodeAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue},System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage)
member.summary: Wraps responses content in an JSON object that additionally contains HttpStatusCode

member.name: M:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.CorsHelpers.XDRCorsHelper.OverrideHttpMethod(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage)
member.summary: Updates the request's HTTP verb from POST to method requested in 'method' query parameter.

member.name: M:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.CorsHelpers.XDRCorsHelper.SetAuthorizationHeader(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage)
member.summary: Reads 'token' query string and adds the Authorization header based on its value.

member.name: T:IQ.Platform.Framework.WebApi.CorsHelpers.XDRCorsHelper
member.summary: Set of functions that transform HTTP request/response to support Internet Explorer 9 XDR object used to perform CORS request. For more information, see the wiki page: https://wiki.iqmetrix.com/display/Platform/Internet+Explorer+CORS+(Cross-origin+resource+sharing)+Support
